comments:
This has been reproduced with RC4.

1. Open Dynamic Web Project Wizard.
2. Click the "Add project to an EAR" checkbox.
3. Click the "New.." button next to the ear combo.
4. Click the "Cancel" button on the launched ear project wizard.
5. Look in the Error Log.

I consistently get the following exception:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Path for project must have only one segment.

changing target from 1.5 M1 to 1.5 M5 to reflect new numbering system as we join Collisto.

I no longer see this on wizard cancel, but get the same stack when deleting ear name.  Opened
